response.job_title: Operational Project Manager LATAM en Majorel
response.summary:
Project Management Professional (PMP®) and electrical engineer, with experience in business area direction, project management in BPO and Healthcare projects, with abilities and skills to direct teams, analyze and develop strategies and methodologies which allow projects and process implementation success.  
Also, has experience and knowledges in electrical installations projects focused in industries, medical buildings, offices, housing buildings, and development of electrical systems for human & electronic safety. 
Due to his professional development, is the kind of person who has excellent relationships with external and internal stakeholders, having abilities in teamwork and soft skills.
response.skills: Project Management, Lean Six Sigma, Project Management Software, Mejora continua, Project Plans, Construction, Hospitales

profile_positions.description:
Duties: 
Head of Business Program Management Area

Direction of project managment department in LATAM region
Direction of expert team for operational new projects in LATAM region
Direction of business programs focused on quality and results assurance
Counselor for commercial teams related with new projects in LATAM region
profile_positions.title: Operational Project Manager LATAM

profile_positions.description:
Duties: 
Project Manager LATAM in BPO Projects. 
Responsible for Implementation of new BPO operational projects in LATAM.
Responsible for the creation of project management process for Majorel LATAM.
Responsible for implement best practices in the project management office.
Responsible for lead and assign projects to PM Analyst located in Colombia and Perú.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager LATAM

profile_positions.description:
Duties:
Project Manager in Laboratory Diagnostics in Colombia.
Project Manager support in Diagnostics Images in Colombia
Onsite Manager in Laboratory Diagnostics in Colombia, Ecuador and Perú.
Responsible for management of projects in laboratory diagnostics and diagnostic images, according to PM@Siemens and PM@SHS methodology.
Responsible for creation, development and supervision of technical specifications for medical devices (Xray, Magnet Resonance, Laboratory Automation, Atellica Solution, etc). Management of stakeholders as customers, local providers, engineers and construction teams to develop projects in medical buildings.
profile_positions.title: Onsite Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Designer for M.Sc. Carlos Eduardo Sanchez Diaz; working as a design assistant and inspector, in buildings for the Directorate of Criminal Investigation and Interpol or DIJIN. Also, making electrical designs for hospitals in Neiva (Colombia) and Cali (Colombia).
profile_positions.title: Diseñador eléctrico

profile_positions.description: Auxiliary designer for Eng. Juan David Garcia Moreno; working as a design assistant, making electrical designs for schools located in Pacific Region (Colombia), directed by FINDETER. Also, as an electrical designer in social housing projects in Puerto Salgar (Cundinamarca-Colombia) and Panqueva (Boyacá-Colombia)
profile_positions.title: Auxiliar de diseño eléctrico

profile_positions.description: Auxiliary Student for Electrical and Electronic Department at Universidad Nacional de Colombia; working as a design assistant and inspector, in extension project at the Universidad Nacional de Colombia, Bogota; making electrical designs and intervention in buildings for the Police Directorate or by its Spanish acronym DIPOL.
profile_positions.title: Estudiante auxiliar

education.field_of_study: Administración y gestión de empresas, general

education.degree_name: Majorel Six Sigma + Lean Yellow Belt
Master en Project Management con Mención en Business Analytics
Auditor Interno en Dirección de Proyectos ISO21500

company.name: Majorel Colombia
company.description:
¡Bienvenido/a a Majorel! Diseñamos, ofrecemos y marcamos la diferencia en el servicio de atención al cliente que prestamos en nombre de algunas de las marcas más respetadas del mundo. Nuestra combinación de talento, tecnología e innovación brinda un valor real a nuestros clientes.

Somos más de 82.000 empleados/as en 45 países de Europa, Oriente Medio, África, América y Asia, ofreciendo un excelente servicio a más de 500 compañías en 60 idiomas diferentes. Creatividad, excelencia y respeto son los valores que guían nuestro trabajo.

En Colombia contamos ya con más de 10 años de experiencia y sedes en Barranquilla, Bucaramanga y Medellín. Nuestro equipo reúne más 2.000 profesionales de muy diversos perfiles, orígenes y culturas… ¡y seguimos en constante crecimiento!

Además, nuestra excelente cultura de empresa en Colombia está reconocida con la certificación Great Place To Work®.

Te invitamos a seguir nuestra página de LinkedIn para mantenerte al día de toda la actualidad de la empresa y nuestras ofertas de empleo. No te pierdas, además, nuestras iniciativas Feel Good, los consejos de nuestro departamento de Recursos Humanos… ¡y mucho más!

Somos Majorel. Somos #OneTeam.
